title: Supply Chain Professionals’ Forum first networking reception on Friday
body_lines: Supply Chain Professionals’ Forum will hold its first networking reception on Friday 11 March at Waters Edge, Rajagiriya.

SCPF is a members’ network created in 2017 and today there are over 250 members in this group related to supply chain, commercial and logistics activities. The group was designed to help each other who are involved in day-to-day supply chain processes and learn about a range of timely topics across the industry.

Group creator Asanga Weerackody of e-visible said that this is a wonderful day for these 250 members from around 200 corporates who had very close relationships digitally, to meet for the first time in an enjoyable atmosphere. Further he said that there is no better time than this to come together as an industry and look forward with specific ideas and opportunities to remove supply chain friction and improve our agility and resilience.
SCPF also would like to invite those who are related to supply chain to join the event by calling Danu on 071 455 7729.
